name: GiveCampus Progress
description: A simple Sinatra application that populates GiveCampus content in CSS

DONORS_PATH.description: The path to the donor count.

GOAL_PATH.description: The path to the percent of donor goal.

RAISED_PATH.description: The path to the amount of money raised.

LEADERBOARD_PATH.description: The path to the leaderboard object.

LEADERBOARDITEM_CLASS.description: The search query to find the class leaderboard.

LEADERBOARDITEM_SCHOLARSHIP.description: The search query to find the scholarship leaderboard.

SCREENSHOT_URL.description: The URL to screenshot for the backup image.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Amazon Web Services secret access key.
